channel.title: Profiles on rs-team
channel.description: Recent content in Profiles on rs-team

item.title: abaddon
item.description: Nikos Oikonomou (abaddon) I’m a Software Dev turned PenTester and The Creator of this fine web portal. About me I always considered coding easy and fun, I later found out that breaking stuff was way more exciting. That should be reason enough for anyone with a CS background to get into PenTesting. That, and the fact that you get to be called a “hacker”. Fields of expertise Linux (I use Arch btw) PenTesting Binary Exploitation Scripting (need a quicker way to do something?

item.title: mikts
item.description: Mike Tsoukatos (mikts) I’m a DevOps Engineer based in Athens, Greece. About me I love studying new technologies and tools and automating infastructure deployments. My other passion is penetration testing and ctf challenges. Also I always try to take advantage of DevOps best practices to incorporate security testing in the development pipelines. Automate everything! Fields of expertise Linux Scripting Automation Docker Interests Petting Cats Breaking things Wannabe Chef State of mind Life is a party and im the pinata!
